content: NCV 4-22 Cordless concrete vibrator Handheld cordless pencil concrete vibrator with brushless motor for compaction of small pours (Nuron battery platform) ### Categories: Home > Products > Power tools > Specialty power tools- - - ### FEATURES:Features High-performance compaction – 15,000 vibrations per minute thanks to powerful brushless motor Safer jobsites – low-noise, low-vibration operation and no trailing power cords make NCV-22 cordless concrete vibrators a great way to reduce hazards on your jobsites On the Nuron battery platform – cordless tools without compromise thanks to longer-lasting batteries and a range of services to keep you productive, today and tomorrow Compact and agile – weighing under 8 lbs including 4 ft. whip, this pencil vibrator delivers optimum handling and easier access to tight spaces Applications Concrete compaction in small pours to remove trapped air bubbles, excess water and increase density of concrete surface Consolidating thin concrete slabs and small footings Leveling and removing air bubbles in curbs and planter walls Block/narrow walls ### TECHNICAL DATA: Vibration frequency: 15,000 VPM Head diameter: 1.10 in Hose length: 47-1/4 in Technical Data | Vibration frequency | 15,000 VPM | Head diameter | 1.10 in | Hose length | 47-1/4 in | Rated voltage | 21.6 V ### ITEMS- 2352795 - NCV 4-22 Compact Cordless Vibrator - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x NCV 4-22 Int. conc. vibrator - 3902939 - NCV 4-22 Kit NSE - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x C 8-22 110-127V Battery charger - 1x NCV 4-22 Int. conc. vibrator - 2x B 22-85 Li-ion Battery pack
